newsitem.title: USA: Braun's says CFO duties assumed by COO.
newsitem.headline: Braun's says CFO duties assumed by COO.

text.p: Braun's Fashions Corp said chief financial officer Stephen Clark left the company during the month of April following a reorganization.
"Until a successor is named, the financial leadership of the company will be assumed by Herbert Froemming, president and chief operating officer," said the womens' clothing retailer.
Froemming was the company's chief financial officer before becoming president in 1994.

Braun's operates 172 stores in 20 states, including five new stores opened thus far this year and three stores which were closed due to lease expirations. The stores are located primarily in the Midwest and Pacific Northwest.
The company said it recently exited Chapter 11 reorganization proceedings.
